text: Bachchan Pandey is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language action film directed by Farhad Samji, written by Nischay Kuttanda and Farhad Samji and produced by Sajid Nadiadwala. It stars Akshay Kumar and Kriti Sanon in lead roles. Initially planned as a remake of Veeram (2014), the film follows an original script by Kuttanda and Samji. Bachchan Pandey is scheduled to be released on 22 January 2021. == Cast == * Akshay Kumar * Kriti Sanon == Release == Bachchan Pandey was earlier scheduled to release on 25 December 2020, but was changed to 22 January 2021, to avoid release conflict with Aamir Khan's project Laal Singh Chaddha (2020). ==References== == External links == * *Bachchan Pandey On Bollywood Hungama Category:2021 films Category:Hindi- language films Category:Indian films
title: Bachchan Pandey
